Package com.gopivotal.examples.hbase.resplit

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateRowMapper
    A TableMapper instance that will only emit create statuses
    DeleteRowMapper
    A TableMapper instance that will only emit delete statuses
    RowSamplerMapper
    This TableMapper implementation will emit 1% of all create and delete flags.
    RowSamplerReducer
    This reducer class sorts all the input values associated with a key and writes to the appropriate output via MultipleOutputs.
    TwitterTableSplit
    This Driver class splits an HBase table that is using an TwitterHBaseModel.
